channel.title: Bamboo Village recruiting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bamboo Village recruiting"

item.title: Bamboo Village recruiting
item.content:encoded:
Hello,
We here at Bamboo village are always looking for more villagers, casual or hardcore. We've got plenty of upgrades including NRF, Ramen shop, Tools, and a Juice bar but we lack the villagers for them to stay activated. Taxes are low and nobody has Terry 3 if you're looking for Kaiju drops.

-Yoh, Recently crowned Kage
